CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 1, 1962, pg. 28, reads: "University of Pittsburgh Guests - The Peabody High School football team, 1962 City League champions, were honored in a goodwill dinner at the Pitt Student Union Ballroom, Tuesday night. Included among guests were Jim Brown, incomparable Cleveland Browns full-back and members of the All-City selections.  Left to right: Dave Gerasole, Peabody; Terrry [Terry] Clark, Langley; John Brewer, Peabody; dinner chairman Ted Abel; Brown; Pat Buratti, Langley; Gary Smith, Langley, and Jim Levey Peabody.  Other hosts included municipal and Pitt representatives.  Brown flew to the city to join the formal celebration. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Cleveland Browns football player Jim Brown surrounded by high school football players from left: Dave Gerasole, Terry Clark, John Brewer, Ted Abel, Jim Brown, Pat Puratti or Buratti, Gary Smith, and Jim Levy or Levey, in University of Pittsburgh Student Union
